author: frangio_
content: has removal of MSIZE been considered for EOF? it seems like it could be useful for some potential future translation to temporarily write to memory and MSIZE would make that observable

author: frangio_
content: although i guess without MSIZE you wouldn't be able to figure out where to write in the first place

author: _shemnon
content: Without a generalized shift to something like a gas schedule based on paged memory the MSIZE has clear utility.

author: _shemnon
content: Temperature check: I was considering going through existing open EIPs with opcodes and adding a new table for newly proposed opcodes, like this https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-7519.md?plain=1#L42-L45 - except also adding an "immediate arguments" column for stuff like RJUMP and EOFCREATE's immediates. I think the meaning of each input would not be in the summary table but elsewhere in the EIP.
